fields.label: Footer Items
fields.name: footer_default
fields.instructions: Enable the items to build a Footer.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: footer_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of the Footer is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: footer_background_color
fields.instructions: This color will be applied to the Footer.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: footer_container
fields.instructions: Choose the width of the Footer Container.

fields.label: Vertical Spacing
fields.name: footer_vertical_spacing
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of the Footer in the Desktop Version. (Screens larger than 768px).

fields.label: Vertical Spacing < 768px
fields.name: footer_vertical_spacing_responsive
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of the Footer in the Mobile Version. (Screens smaller than 768px).

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: footer_columns
fields.instructions: Choose from 1-6 columns for the Footer.

fields.label: Logo
fields.name: logo
fields.instructions: The Logo will be positioned in the first column of the Footer.

fields.label: Logo Height
fields.name: footer_logo_height
fields.instructions: Adjust the height of the Logo. The width will be set automatically.

fields.label: Logo Filter
fields.name: footer_logo_filter
fields.instructions: Enable this option for the Logo to be 100% white. This is useful when the Footer is dark.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.instructions: Create a description that will be positioned below the Logo or Text.

fields.label: Social Icons
fields.name: footer_social_networks
fields.instructions: Here you can add Social Network Icons for the Footer. Add a Custom Item for more freedom.

fields.label: Columns
fields.name: columns
fields.instructions:
Add Columns to the Footer. You can build Content with Item List or Custom Content.

You can also build new widgets and add to the Footer.

fields.label: Left Text
fields.name: copyright_left_text
fields.instructions: Here you can add a text that will be positioned to the left at the bottom of the Footer.

fields.label: Right Text
fields.name: copyright_right_text
fields.instructions: Here you can add a text that will be positioned to the right at the bottom of the Footer.
fields.default_value: ¬© 2021 Leverage is Proudly Powered by Codings.
